title: Local Guardian Issue
content: My brother is a resident of banglore since last 10yrs, but his age would be 32-33, and yesterday the warden said, that until 34yrs is ok, would there be any problem, hostel at rr campus.

comments.body: Bullshit. My lg is my brother who's 25
I stayed in the hostel, my local guardian was at my hometown. They don't physicaly check if the guardian exists.
Lmao I had the exact same issue back in my day. I just photoshopped a scanned copy of his Aadhar lmao
How did u convince the warden, cause today I went he said that he must be atleast 34-35, and my bro is 32 rn, hw will be 33 in June, so how?

I just never mentioned it. Just filled the form and nobody objected

Very weird that the warden has a problem with it. Ec campus?
